entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Go to the pile of reinforced metal plates and collect 3.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Pick up 3 base armor pieces from the armor stockpile.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Get 3 boxes of rivets to complete the new armor pieces for the ship.
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: Return to Beniar Nevran for a reward.
